pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tests in Linear Mixed Effects Models // Provides p-values in type I, II or III anova and summary tables for lmer model fits (cf. lme4) via Satterthwaite's degrees of freedom method. A Kenward- Roger method is also available via the pbkrtest package. Model selection methods include step, drop1 and anova-like tables for random effects (ranova). Methods for Least-Square means (LS- means) and tests of linear contrasts of fixed effects are also available.
